examples.example: 有人在遇到困难时总是积极乐观地去面对。

translate.english: Some people always face difficulties positively and optimistically when encountering them.

examples.example: 有人总是热心地帮助他人，传递着温暖与善意。

translate.english: Some people always enthusiastically help others, passing on warmth and kindness.

examples.example: 有人在生活中总是充满热情地探索新事物。

translate.english: Some people are always full of enthusiasm to explore new things in life.
